a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
Included are conflicts between states where force was
threatened, displayed, used
, or escalated to a
war
that
Data source: Gibler and Miller - Militarized Interstate Events (2023)
Note: The number of states has increased a lot over time. Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be
